data.name: The Lewd of the Cock Rings: The Return of Doug Fooker
data.detailed_description: Role Playing Game involving adventure and sex that combines the elements of a 70's porn movie and fantasy science fiction. You are the naked fighter known as Doug Fooker. You are joined by your friends Nunya Bidness and Kim Aginavi. You need to destroy the Cock Ring of Power before it falls into the hands of Richard Cranium. Adventure through the lands in a mythological sexual-psychological RPG involving having sex with bizarre creatures from the ancient world. Sex scenes are randomly found throughout the game and are re-playable. There are numerous interactive sexual interactions within the game which the player can decide to participate in. Players can completely avoid sexual interactions. Players can just enjoy the RPG experience of leveling up and ending the game. Game can be played with one hand. You never know when, where, or what kind of sex scene will appear.

data.short_description: This is a fantasy, turn-based, RPG game involving nudity and sexual situations. The main character is a male protagonist roaming the countryside trying to stop the evil antagonist. Random re-playble interactive sex scenes are located throughout the entire game involving varied anthromorphs.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
